text: Takheun beu meuceh nyoe kon beurakah Takheun kon bak lon na gudang Tuhan Peue nyang hana trang pih han lon peugah Peue-peue nyang gaeb hana lon tupat Lom malaikat kon lon lonpeugah Peue-peue nyang wahyu nyan nyang lon ikot Nyan Neuyue turot bak lon le Allah Takheun ek saban teuma si buta Ngon si trang mata dumpeue deuh leumah Peue gata bandum hana tapike Ngon mata ate Neubri le Allah
